name: OpenBoxes
description: OpenBoxes is an open-source logistics management information system (LMIS) designed to serve the supply-chain management demands of public health systems. It's an open source LMIS system designed for health systems in developing countries

SDGs.evidenceText: OpenBoxes provides health organizations with a free logistics management solutions designed for use in developing countries. The digital solution is designed specifically to support logistics at low-resource health facilities
